titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation against priuate challenges and combats: vvith articles annexed for the better directions to be vsed therein, and for the more iudiciall proceeding against offenders.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: VVestminster the fourth day of February, in the eleuenth yeere of our reigne ..
The publication year is given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 13; Steele notation: and pose 2) doeth 3) bee 4) speedie then.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
